data.title: CONTENTdm
data.meta_description: Reverend William "Billy" Graham speaks about holding an integrated Easter worship service in Birmingham, Alabama. The service was one of his popular revival meetings, which he called "crusades." Rev. Graham describes the service as the "beginning of a new era of racial understanding in Birmingham."
